message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to let it go for $180.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to consider that price?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I appreciate your interest in the product, but I'm afraid I'm not willing to go as low as $120. I'm thinking more along the lines of $160. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $160 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $120 and $160, which would be $140. Would you be willing to consider that price?

Hi Bob, I see you're willing to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go that low. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get at least $150 for the product. Would you be willing to go up to that price?
Hi Alice, I understand your concerns, but $150 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable with. I'm willing to go up to $145, but no higher. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, I'm starting to get a bit worried that we're not going to meet in the middle, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $155, which is my absolute lowest price. If you're still interested, let me know!
